text: So the Lord said: “If you hadThe manuscripts are evenly divided between ‘had’ and ‘have’; I follow the best line of transmission. faith like a mustard seed has,What kind of ‘faith’ might a mustard seed have? Albeit so small, it reacts without question to the climactic circumstances, and grows to remarkable proportions. If we reacted similarly, without question, to the Holy Spirit's promptings, our spiritual ‘climactic circumstances’, we should indeed move mountains, literally. you could say to this mulberry tree, ‘Be uprooted, and be planted in the sea,’ and it would obey you.
